thread.section_title: Travelgenio Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Travelgenio | travelgenio.de
thread.title: Max Bayer

author: Max Bayer
title: Max Bayer
text: I booked flights using the online purchase form and was held in the believe the booking had been processed correctly and I was sent relevant travel information. At a later point (during online checkin) I realised contacting customer support that my payment had not been processed and I was never informed there was a problem and the booking status appeared as confirmed and paid. I had to pay double the price of the original payment to be able to fly. Travelgenio never again!
